name: Samurai Ninja Wars
description: Samurai Ninja Wars is a fast paced, blood soaked, action platformer. Run, jump, dodge, block, and slash your way through 50 challenging levels. Your skills and reflexes will be pushed to the limit, as you try to reach the end of each stage with your head still attached to your neck. Your enemies will be cunning and ruthless.  Cut them down, and follow the way of the Samurai.
